trans-unit.source: Provides the ability to navigate through an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Possibilita a navegação por um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This class implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> object in an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> atual em um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> objeto na coleção.

trans-unit.source: After an enumerator is created, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.Current%2A> property; otherwise, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.Current%2A> returns `null` or throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Depois que um enumerador é criado, o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> método deve ser chamado para avançar o enumerador para o primeiro elemento da coleção antes de ler o valor da <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.Current%2A> propriedade; caso contrário, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.Current%2A> retorna `null` ou lança uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.Current%2A> also returns `null` or throws an exception if the last call to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`, which indicates that the end of the collection has been reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.Current%2A> também retorna `null` ou gera uma exceção se a última chamada <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> retorna `false`, que indica que o final da coleção foi atingido.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.Current%2A> does not move the position of the enumerator, and consecutive calls to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.Current%2A> return the same object until <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.Current%2A> não move a posição do enumerador e chamadas consecutivas para <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.Current%2A> retornar o mesmo objeto até <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator> classe.

trans-unit.source: Advances to the next <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> object in an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Avança para o próximo objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> em um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; <see langword="false" />, if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o enumerador tiver avançado com êxito para o próximo elemento, <see langword="false" /> se o enumerador tiver passado do final da coleção.

trans-unit.source: After an enumerator is created, it is positioned before the first element of the collection, and the first call to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method moves the enumerator over the first element of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Depois que um enumerador é criado, ele está posicionado antes do primeiro elemento da coleção e a primeira chamada para o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> método Move o enumerador sobre o primeiro elemento da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> advance the enumerator past subsequent elements.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas subsequentes para <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> Avançar o enumerador após elementos subsequentes.

trans-unit.source: After the end of the collection is passed, calls to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Após o final da coleção for passado, chamadas para <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> retornar `false`.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator is valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Um enumerador é válido desde que a coleção permaneça inalterada.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator becomes invalid and the next call to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> can throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Se forem feitas alterações na coleção, como adicionar, modificar, ou excluir elementos, o enumerador se torna inválido e a próxima chamada para <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> pode lançar um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator> classe.

trans-unit.source: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.
trans-unit.target: A coleção foi modificada depois da criação do enumerador.

trans-unit.source: Sets an enumerator to its initial position.
trans-unit.target: Define um enumerador como sua posição inicial.

trans-unit.source: The initial position of an enumerator is before the first element in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: A posição inicial de um enumerador está antes do primeiro elemento de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Um enumerador permanece válido desde que a coleção continue inalterada.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator becomes invalid, and the next call to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.Reset%2A> method throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Se forem feitas alterações na coleção, como adicionar, modificar, ou excluir elementos, o enumerador se torna inválido e a próxima chamada para o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator.Reset%2A> método lança um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataEnumerator> classe.

trans-unit.source: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.
trans-unit.target: A coleção foi modificada depois da criação do enumerador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> object in an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> atual em um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedDataCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> atual.
